turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. I need to order a pizza from Bella Luna pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what kind of pizza would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm going to get four small chicken barbecue pizzas with thick crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 4 small thick crust chicken bbq pizzas, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $52, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will you be picking up, having it delivered, or dining in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready for pickup in 30 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
